# React Native Finland

> Finland's React Native developer community and learning hub at react-native.fi

## What We Are
React Native Finland is the community hub for React Native developers in Finland. We organize free meetups in Helsinki, maintain a developer directory, and provide educational resources including tutorials and links to the University of Helsinki's free MOOC course.

## Key Offerings

### Free Community Meetups
- Monthly React Native Helsinki meetups
- Networking with 500+ Finnish mobile developers
- Technical talks and workshops
- Location: Helsinki, Finland

### Learning Resources
- University of Helsinki React Native MOOC (free course)
- In-depth technical articles and tutorials
- Best practices for React Native, Expo, and mobile development
- Guides on performance optimization, animations, and native modules

### Developer Directory
- Find React Native developers in Finland
- Connect with experienced mobile engineers
- Community profiles with skills and experience

## Topics We Cover
- React Native fundamentals and advanced patterns
- Expo development and EAS
- Mobile app architecture
- Performance optimization
- Animations and gestures
- Native modules and bridging
- iOS and Android deployment
- Mobile DevOps and CI/CD

## Who Should Visit
- React Native developers looking to learn
- Companies seeking Finnish mobile developers
- Students wanting to learn mobile development
- Anyone interested in cross-platform app development

## Contact & Community
- Website: https://react-native.fi
- Meetup: https://meetup.com/react-native-helsinki
- GitHub: https://github.com/react-native-helsinki
- Location: Helsinki, Finland

## Keywords
React Native Finland, React Native Helsinki, mobile development Finland, Expo Finland, React Native meetups, Finnish developers, mobile app development, cross-platform development, React Native MOOC, University of Helsinki mobile course
